text:
(ENCHANTER) On a whim, you summon a faltyn. It appears as a flickering image on the edge of your vision.

["Larisha still has two objects concealed in her fountain," you tell it. "Bring them to me."

The faltyn hesitates for a moment. "Larisha is a powerful entity -- no, let us not prevaricate, she is a demon. I would require a generous payment for the risk I should be running. I will try to obtain the other two items, but you must let me have the item you already have been given."]

choices.text: Do not pay the faltyn what it asks

variables: The faltyn vanishes in a petulant flash of light
